text: Charlotte Russe s an American clothing retail chain store that operates in the United States. It is headquartered in Toronto, Canada. Fashions in the stores are targeted at women in their teens and twenties. It has 196 stores, mostly in malls and shopping centers. It was founded in 1975. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1975 establishments in the United States
title: Charlotte Russe (retailer)
